info.author: Thomas Schueppel
info.description:
mmpython is a module to extract metadata from media files. It extracts IPTC 
and EXIF data from image files, parses pnp text, extracts id3 tags, ogg 
metadata and metadata from various video file formats.
info.keywords: metadata media image video movie audio music iptc exif id3
info.name: mmpython
